summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Housing and Human Services, authorizing an agreement with the United States Department of Justice for financial assistance for the operation of the "SafeFutures" Program to prevent and reduce youth violence and criminal activity, creating certain positions, increasing the expenditure allowances in the 1996 budget of the Department of Housing and Human Services, and ratifying and confirming prior acts, all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
committee: Health, Housing, Human Services, Education and Libraries
